title: Petition for Mordekaiser to quote Monty Python after his rework

ehhh I don't even mind 5/4 of them anymore.

Morde is probably the biggest problem child of League now. Not from a balance perspective but from an enjoyment perspective.

I personally just play for fun so I'd rather get dunked on by "unbalanced" champs than have to play a champ like current Morde.

Since you ask, because i feel there's some champions that take priority over him. Most of you guys just want reworks because you want something new not because you feel it helps the game or the overall champion pool.

@Malicious Metal, This is brilliant I hope this gets implemented for his rework or a similar line.

@RainbowIcee, {{champion:82}}  is one of the most broken champions in the game right now. Both his bugs and kit are severely bad. The "rework" made him an Immobile ADC instead of his intended Juggernaut. While I admit {{champion:429}} {{champion:142}}  have a kit that can not be fun to play against, they are much more put together than {{champion:82}} kit. He has needed a rework for quite awhile and I would be shocked to see {{champion:429}}  and {{champion:142}}  get one before him.
How about if he kills someone while near death himself (let's assume 30% hp or less) triggers this? What other quotes (references or not) would you use?
Honestly, just fix his bugs and he'll be K i think.
